question: As the result of his research during the COVID-19 pandemic, medical anthropologist Mark Nichter proposed the need for what he called anticipatory anthropology. Which of the following best defines this concept?

answers.text: An approach that would identify and address inequity in the delivery of and access to health care
Efforts that will repair any existing weaknesses in the health care system before the next health crisis emerges
A method of public health and education outreach
Creating networks and task forces in order to reach and serve those populations showing the greatest areas of disparity
